item.title: Multitouch in Ubuntu Unity with uTouch
item.description: This video from the Ubuntu Developers channel demonstrates multitouch capabilities provided by the uTouch gesture framework in Ubuntu Unity.

item.title: ZaReason Terra HD
item.description: The Terra HD is a thin and lightweight 11.6-inch netbook/subnotebook by Linux hardware builder ZaReason. It is powered by a 1.66 GHz Intel Atom N450 CPU.
